name: area
description: An automation platform similar to IFTTT/Zapier that enables users to connect various services and create automated workflows through Actions and REActions.

scripts.dev:server: sh -c 'command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm --filter application-server run start:dev || npm run start:dev --workspace=application-server'
scripts.dev:web: sh -c 'command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm --filter web-client run dev || npm run dev --workspace=web-client'
scripts.build:server: sh -c 'command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm --filter application-server run build || npm run build --workspace=application-server'
scripts.build:web: sh -c 'command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm --filter web-client run build || npm run build --workspace=web-client'
scripts.build:mobile: cd mobile-client && flutter pub get && flutter create --platforms=android && flutter build apk --release && cd ..
scripts.build:all: sh -c 'command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm install && pnpm run build:server && pnpm run build:web && pnpm run build:mobile || npm install && npm run build:server && npm run build:web && npm run build:mobile'
scripts.lint:server: sh -c 'command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm --filter application-server run lint || npm run lint --workspace=application-server'
scripts.lint:web: sh -c 'command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm --filter web-client run lint || npm run lint --workspace=web-client'
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:web && npm run lint:mobile
scripts.format:server: sh -c 'command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm --filter application-server run format:fix || npm run format:fix --workspace=application-server'
scripts.format:web: sh -c 'command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm --filter web-client run format:fix || npm run format:fix --workspace=web-client'
scripts.format:all: npm run format:server && npm run format:web && npm run format:mobile
scripts.test:server: sh -c 'command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm --filter application-server run test:all || npm run test:all --workspace=application-server'
scripts.test:web: sh -c 'command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm --filter web-client run test || npm run test --workspace=web-client'
scripts.test:all: npm run test:server && npm run test:web && npm run test:mobile

application-server/**/*.ts: sh -c 'command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm --filter application-server run format || npm run format --workspace=application-server'
sh -c 'command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm --filter application-server run lint || npm run lint --workspace=application-server'
web-client/**/*.{ts,tsx}: sh -c 'command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm --filter web-client run format || npm run format --workspace=web-client'
sh -c 'command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm --filter web-client run lint || npm run lint --workspace=web-client'
